idea:
ZipThruQ is a Cafeteria Management Solution, designed specifically for company cafeterias and business park food courts. We focus on increasing their efficiency through digital products, enabling quick employee movement within limited cafeteria spaces. 

ZipThruQ enables Companies to streamline their cafeteria operations digitally and ensure enhanced time management without having to allocate additional space to the cafeteria, improves sales for Caterers while providing them detailed insights about their customer base and enhances employees productivity by enabling them to skip long queues at the counter everyday.

Download the App or log onto www.zipthruq.com for more details.
name: ZIPTHRUQ TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are Freight Forwarding company and provide logistics service for Import and Export both Sea and Air
name: BIRDVIEW GLOBAL LOGISTICS PRIVATE LIMITED
